```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r data}
library(dplyr)
d <- read.csv("Ecosystem_engineers_and_predation_risk_data_-.csv")
head(d)
d %>% 
  rename(Pair_number = pair.number,
    Vole_Presence = no.voles.vs..voles,
    Initial_PlantVol = Initial.plant.volume..m3.,
    Change_PlantVol = change.in.plant.volume..m3..,
    Sampling_Date = sampling.date.plant.volume..m3.,
    Plant_Cover = A..splendens.cover,
    June_Birds = number.of.visits.by.predatory.birds.June,
    July_Birds = number.of.visits.by.predatory.birds.July,
    August_Birds = number.of.visits.by.predatory.birds.August,
    Total_Birds15 = total.visits.by.predatory.birds.15.days,
    Bird_visits = no..times.of.predatory.bird.visiting,
    Vole_recaptured = no..of.voles.recaptured,
    Vole_mortality = vole.mortality.rate...., 
    Plant_volm3 = change.in.plant.volume..m3.,
    )
```
## Fig 2
 
```{r Fig2}

library(ggplot2)

ggplot(d) +
    geom_bar( aes(x=no.voles.vs..voles, y=change.in.plant.volume..m3..), stat="identity", fill="skyblue", alpha=0.001) +
    geom_errorbar( aes(x=no.voles.vs..voles, ymin=0.49, ymax=0.63), width=0.4, colour="orange", alpha=0.9, linewidth=1.3)
```
